charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw a Ponyta racing
up toward the volcano and decided to chase it.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1101_020:
At the end of the chase, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found 
Blaine deep in thought.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_090:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t hear you coming!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_100:
I was just trying to think up a quiz using Ponyta
as the subject.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_110: I can’t come up with a single idea!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_120:
I haven’t been able to come up with anything
good lately. I might be in a slump.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0301_130: Show me what you have so far!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_160:
It’s the worst it’s been for me since I started
thinking up these quizzes!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_170:
But now let me think.
Ah, yes—let’s try this one out.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_180:
Bam! A question!
We all know that Pasio is an artificial island...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_190:
But there is, in fact, a Pokémon that 
only exists on this island! True or false?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_250: I feel like I can do better than that, though.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_260:
That wasn’t much of a quiz... 
More like testing general knowledge.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_280:
I have to think of more fun questions, or else I
won’t even be able to focus on Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0301_290: I don’t think those are related...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0401_300: You don’t get it, do you?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_320: Exactly! I have to get out of this slump quickly!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_330:
Life is one big question! It’s a cycle of asking
yourself questions and figuring out answers!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_340:
Every mystery you solve is one more step you
take in your growth!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_350: The same can be said for Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_360:
No matter what walls you run into, you become
stronger every time you overcome one!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_370:
As long as I live, I will continue thinking up quiz
questions and having Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_380:
That is my way of life as the hotheaded
quiz master!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_460:
I actually thought of something 
when I was shouting my manifesto...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_470:
But the impact of my revelation
made me forget it again!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_480:
It was going to be my swan song!
My masterpiece!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_490: Ponyta! Kick me in the head!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_500:
Maybe I’ll recall it if I get 
kicked in the head really hard!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0401_520:
What’s wrong, Ponyta? You’re saying that my
head is more important than quizzes?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0302_530: This might not be a good idea...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_540:
What’s wrong, Ponyta? You’re saying that my
head is more important than quizzes?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_550:
Don’t worry about it! My head may seem
defenseless, but it’s plenty trained!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_560:
Fine... It’s a waste, but I suppose I’ll forget
about that quiz.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_580:
One day, I will think of a quiz that everybody
can enjoy!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_590: I will make quizzes the next craze on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_1201_010:
...You’re Blaine, aren’t you?
I hear you’re pretty famous in Kanto...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_1201_020:
Indeed I am!
You need something from me?
Are you interested in my quizzes?
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_1201_030:
I heard that you were a strong Fire-type user,
and I wanted to challenge you...
Have a battle with me.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_1201_040:
Ah, I see now.
You’re a Fire-type user, too.
All right, let’s do this!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0101_010:
I’m going all out.
I’ll show you what I’m made of!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_010:
It’s a shame I lost...
But that was a great battle. I feel like I can get
even stronger. Thank you, Blaine.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_020:
No no, I should be thanking you!
Your silent but intense fighting spirit set my soul
ablaze, too!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_030:
I can’t let myself be beaten by young Trainers!
Just because I’m getting old doesn’t mean I’m
getting cold! Gotta keep that fire alive! Hah!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_040: Wha...? Even your Ponyta looks energized...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_050: Hah! Ponyta, you feel the same way, do you?
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_060:
Then we just ride on—full speed ahead!
The two of us are gonna get stronger and
stronger! Hah!
